title: gals on the couch ft. katy bellotte
itunes:title: gals on the couch ft. katy bellotte
description:
Katy Bellotte joins Brooke and Danielle today to chat about… literally everything!  The gals discuss what’s happening in pop culture, their (unpopular) opinions on specific celebrities, share some funny recent stories, and catch up on life!  Join all 3 gals for a fun, lighthearted chat on this weeks episode.    Be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies and stories!

Katy Bellotte: https://instagram.com/katybellotte?utm_medium=copy_link
Katy’s Podcast, Thick & Thin: https://instagram.com/thick.and.thin.podcast?utm_medium=copy_link
Katy’s Dating Podcast, Match Made in Manhattan: https://instagram.com/matchmadepodcast?utm_medium=copy_link

SHOP GOTG MERCH! *NEW COLLECTION NOW AVAILABLE* https://fanjoy.co/collections/gals-on-the-go 

GOTG jams playlist https://open.spotify.com/playlist/1vQ4FvPya39ff8SOGK9Dg9?si=87f7bd7fbc4445fd 


GOTG YouTube Channel (watch full episodes with video!)  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkCy3xcN257Hb_VWWU5C5vA  


Gals On The Go Instagram https://www.instagram.com/galsonthegopodcast/  

Brooke’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/brookemiccio  
Brooke’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/brookemiccio/  

Danielle’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/c/daniellecarolan  
Danielle’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/daniellecarolan/
